name: [LD48] Delve Deeper
description:
Delve deeper to the ancient dwarven ruins!

Explore, Figth, Collect. Those are your primary goals!

You take contol over a dwarf adventurer named Bucket, venturing into the dark!

Controls:

  • A, D = Move Left, Right
  • W = Jump
  • Space = Attack
  • Q = Heal
  • E = Interact
